pullRequest.title: [Contract] Add routers_internal to NetworkConfiguration Entity
pullRequest.bodyText:
This PR is mainly about:

Add routers_internal to NetworkConfiguration entity

commit.message:
add dhcp/router/gateway/l2/l3 neighbor to port

add dhcp/router/gateway/l2/l3 neighbor to port creation

change according to discussion this morning 08/05

change subnet info according to discussion this morning 08/05
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/futurewei-cloud/alcor into master
change to internal router info from router table

nodes.bodyText: We only have one GW MAC address.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -178,157 +178,195 @@ anchor:Create_Port_NetworkConfiguration[]
 
 * Example
 * Use Case Desc: 
-` client should send out NetworkConfiguration to create (bulk) port(s)  unless port to be created inside the NetworkConfiguration itself in which case client should remember the neighbor infos among newly created ports `
+` client should send out NetworkConfiguration to create (bulk) port(s)  unless port to be created inside the NetworkConfiguration itself in which case client should remember the neighbor infos among newly created ports, also the subnet info passing down to DPM should contain portId/dhcpId/routerId/gatewayId(if any) per subnet to support L2/L3 NeighborInfo`
 
 http://localhost:8080/v4/port/

nodes.bodyText:
This subnet_internal is aligned with our InternalSubnetEntity, at least the following fields:

portIdsPerHost
gatewayMacs
dhcpIds


  
    
      alcor/web/src/main/java/com/futurewei/alcor/web/entity/dataplane/InternalSubnetEntity.java
    
    
         Line 20
      in
      83f950b
    
    
    
    

        
          
           public class InternalSubnetEntity extends SubnetEntity {

nodes.bodyText: Suggest to rename the variable name to routerInfo.
Need to add setter and getter for the new field, and update ToString method.
Replace "tab" with space throughout the document.
@haboy52581 the variable name itself remains unchanged.
